Name: MicroSpy
About the game: Take control of the most advanced, insect-sized spy drone. Infiltrate enemy facilities, bypass security and defense systems. Steal crucial data, hack into secured networks, sabotage vital installations and assasinate top priority targets. And most importantly - don't ever get detected. MicroSpy is a mix of stealth, action and puzzle. Use your wits to plan and execute complicated espionage operations. Hack or avoid security systems. Use your size as your advantage. Find hidden passages Avoid being detected by security cameras and enemy personel. Your detection will result in self destruction. Warning: MicroSpy is a very challenging game. Expect dying frequently. The are no saves.
